Package com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.sockets

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IServerSocket
    This interface must be implemented by the AdHocServerSocketBluetooth and AdHocServerSocketWifi classes.
    ISocket
    This interface must be implemented by the AdHocSocketBluetooth and AdHocSocketWifi classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdHocServerSocketBluetooth
    This class allows to encapsulate a BluetoothServerSocket object as a AdHocServerSocketBluetooth object and add an abstraction by implementing the IServerSocket interface(IServerSocket).
    AdHocServerSocketWifi
    This class allows to encapsulate a ServerSocket object as a AdHocServerSocketWifi object and add an abstraction by implementing the IServerSocket interface(IServerSocket).
    AdHocSocketBluetooth
    This class allows to encapsulate a BluetoothSocket object as a AdHocSocketBluetooth object and add an abstraction by implementing the IServerSocket interface(IServerSocket).
    AdHocSocketWifi
    This class allows to encapsulate a Socket object as a AdHocSocketWifi object and add an abstraction by implementing the IServerSocket interface(IServerSocket).
    SocketManager
    This class manages the connection between peers and allows to send and receive network messages.
